item.description:
Here it is the event that we went and painted the bowls for.....
Even if you didn't paint a bowl, consider coming out to help support this great event! For a minimum donation of $15.00 you may choose a handmade bowl (maybe you will see the one you painted in March) or one that was crafted by artisans from the community.  The meal is simple:
Soup, bread, beverage and a cookie!    The bowl goes home as an unspoken reminder that somewhere someone’s bowl is empty. Parking:
There is a free trolley with free parking that meets at Good Harbor Beach,  it is on Thatcher Road in Gloucester.  You can leave from there and meet us at the event OR park at the event.  Please note the parking may be a little tight at Cruiseport so be prepared for that, there may also be parking on the street. 

Please remember that if you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the meetup phone number is:  978-304-2811.

Is it time for you to pay your dues?  Please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer” You can pay your dues at any event.  Thank you!

Remember to change your RSVP to an event if your plans change.  

We look forward to seeing you at this event!
Donna & Vicki
item.how_to_find_us: We will be waiting outside for you, if you come later and we aren't there come in and find us at a table.
item.name: Empty Bowl Dinner
